issue.title: [CF 840] ElvUI Timer Text w/o Timer Sweep?
issue.body:
Possible to do this? You can currently do this with the non-ElvUI timer, but the ElvUI option gets grayed out if I disable the cooldown sweep portion.

I'm going to assume this is likely an issue with the ElvUI sweep itself requiring a sweep (or something) to function properly, or else it'd already be in.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo | Imported from CurseForge issue #840 | Raw

comments.body:
That is correct. Because of the way that ElvUI is written, there is no way to enable the text without also enabling the cooldown sweep.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

A shame. Perhaps if I make a ticket to Elv he'll consider tweaking the code.

Thanks for your time again.


> Posted by CurseForge user Freeebo
